title: Rice Pilaf
steps: Rinse rice until water runs clear. Drain.
Melt butter over medium. Cook onion 3 minutes.
Add rice. Stir to coat. Toast until edges turn translucent, 2-3 minutes.
Add broth and salt. Bring to boil.
Cover, reduce to low. Simmer 18 minutes.
Remove from heat. Let sit 5 minutes covered.
notes: Rinsing removes starch for fluffy rice.
